name: Uncover (itch)
description:
Are you alone? Uncover things as you go.

My comment:

This game is actually made over a busy school week. Initially I thought I would be worse off, but it turns out I actually got more time to sketch things out, so I can just implement them right away with minimal hesitation when I get the chance to. Despite the shortcomings, this is the first thing I've ever made that I can actually take pride from. I will be using this as an entry for my co-curricular studies in my school.

Credits:

Brackeys, for his tutorial on dialogue system and audio manager; Grant Marshall, for his Architext font.
